availabilityPredicate.expression:
//Check for these items if they have it AND the relic is available
//please give them the relic

Player_HasItem(GetPlayer(),"Relic_Uncommon_Dusklit_Revelation_key_1") 
&&
Player_HasItem(GetPlayer(),"Relic_Uncommon_Dusklit_Revelation_key_2") 
&&
Player_HasItem(GetPlayer(),"Relic_Uncommon_Dusklit_Revelation_key_3")
&&
Relic_GetRelicInstancesAvailable($#7823459:6064633256294154256$) > 0
